subject: Order #SSN1582
description_text:
Good morning,

I ordered this over 2 weeks ago, it was supposed to ship Monday. The order
status reads Confirmed. When is it going to ship and when can I expect
delivery?
[image: PF&TCO]
*Guy Moulton*
*Warehouse Manager, Tampa*
Direct: 813-392-3550
Mobile: 813-406-1577

*Charlotte Warehouse*
1921 Freedom Drive Charlotte, NC 28208
*Atlanta Warehouse*
3170 Reps Miller Rd, Suite 100, Norcross GA 30071
*Tampa Warehouse*
207 Kelsey Lane Suite A, Tampa, FL 33619
PreferredFloorandTile.com <http://www.preferredfloorandtile.com/>
[image: facebook icon]
<https://www.facebook.com/Preferredfloorandtileco> [image:
